entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. Temperature steady near 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 overnight except gusting to 40 near the Strait of Georgia. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
